synopsis.text: Moriko Morioka is an unemployed woman who finds solace and meaning in the online fantasy game, Fruits de Mer. When her computer unexpectedly breaks down, Moriko reaches out to her in-game friend and guildmate, Yuuta Sakurai, who she discovers is quite tech-savvy. Although anxious about inviting someone into her solitary world, Moriko agrees to have Yuuta come over to help build her a new gaming PC. Upon his arrival, the awkwardness and hilarity ensues as these two gaming addicts try to navigate the tricky boundaries between their virtual friendship and real-life encounter. As Yuuta sets up the new computer, bonds continue to form around their shared love of gaming. However, neither realizes that their online aliases have already connected them closer than they ever imagined. This bonus episode provides fans a glimpse into the budding relationship between Moriko and Yuuta while capturing the humor and heart that made Recovery of an MMO Junkie such a beloved series. At its core, it explores those universally relatable moments when human connections defy our carefully-constructed comfort zones and reveal surprises just outside our door.
